content: Um, we're close, but don't need to finalize right now. Fresh eyes in morning will do well. This is going so fast. You have no idea how long to get to that document that led to what was at one time, as he would say "the fastest growing company in the history of the world". He had to hire the best and the brightest to convince them of his vision and to get behind him. He had to recruit them, train them, make them believe in him and do in person selling non-stop. What I believe is that you can replace all of that, or very close to it with what we are setting up. So this document is important and if it takes some time, it takes some time, but we can do in hours what he had to do over months. Do you think I'm crazy, be honest.
